channel.title: "Error connecting to server" Please help! Willing to pay rsgp!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, this is a topic about my webclient im making.
When i click "run" it goes to the log in page, I type in my username and password and it says "Error connecting to server"...
Why is this? I compiled, I change the "127.0.0.0" To my (my host)No ip.org!
Please help me! I'm willing to give rsgp!!!

item.title: "Error connecting to server" Please help! Willing to pay rsgp!

item.description:
@N_Rassy wrote:

I search “server.java” and i didn’t find it i found other server things and i searched server = inside it and i can’t find anything!!!

Read full topic

item.title: "Error connecting to server" Please help! Willing to pay rsgp!
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

oke cause now i know were you need to change the ip

go to client.java (client sided) find server = change the ip their to your no-ip
second go to server.java (server sided) find server = change the ip their to your no-ip.

compile and your done, try to log in with your client on a different pc.

make sure the server is runnning and your no-ip too, make sure you have portforwarded

Read full topic
